io.micronaut.tracing.instrument.http

Class AbstractOpenTracingFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.micronaut.tracing.instrument.http.AbstractOpenTracingFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Ordered, HttpFilter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OpenTracingClientFilter, OpenTracingServerFilter

    public abstract class AbstractOpenTracingFilter
extends java.lang.Object
implements HttpFilter
    Abstract filter used for Open Tracing based HTTP tracing.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    graemerocher
